Thanks, Gordon, for such an extensive reply. Will go through the list 
and post back.

The machines we have been running this on are Intel Core2 Duos (2 cores) 
@ 2.20 GHz, and each has only a gigabyte of RAM. I guess we have been 
setting the parameters a bit too high for that type of hardware 
configuration, right?

-- 
Youssef Eldakar
Bibliotheca Alexandrina
